name: lua
description: TS to Lua scripts for redis

scripts.build: scripts=$(ls ./scripts/*.ts); for script in $scripts; do tstl --luaBundleEntry $script --luaBundle ./dist/${script%.ts}.lua $script ./types/*.d.ts; node postprocessLua.js ./dist/${script%.ts}.lua; done

hooks./pre-push: node services/db/lib/start & lerna run test --parallel --since origin -- -- --fail-fast; kill $!
